title: Lore Or Champions
body: So, everyone knows Riot has changed Shurima lore. It since hasn't been touched. It also seems like Riot has been prioritizing new character lore and new characters in general. This makes it seem as though they are just fixing the lore in their spare time. So, after balancing and what not, do you think that they focus on new upcoming champions or the lore that is probably going to be remade?
